alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Lamoille; Orange; Washington; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:30AM EST until January 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of up two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of central, northwest and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Isolated power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation will move into the region during the late afternoon hours with the greatest ice accumulations expected in mid to high terrain above 1000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Lamoille; Orange; Washington; Western Windsor
